name: Grilled Moroccan Sardines
recipeIngredient: 2 pounds sardines, scaled and cleaned (heads and tails left on)
3 garlic cloves, peeled and crushed to a paste
Finely grated zest and the juice of 1 lemon
Pinch each saffron threads and hot-red-pepper flakes

recipeInstructions.text: Place sardines in a single layer in a nonreactive dish. Mix the remaining ingredients in a bowl, pour mixture over the sardines and turn sardines to coat. Cover and let marinate 1 hour.
Grill or broil sardines until cooked through, about 2 minutes on each side.
